resources.string: dib is a service that provides resources to people without smartphoens or internet access. This enables people to access crucial information, such as directions despite not having internet access.\nThis is a prototype for a dib app. This, if built as its intended will access the SMS of a user\'s phone to send messages to a Twilio API phone numebr which can then handle the internet-required task and send the user a resonse via SMS.
